attributes.action: Allow british public to be able to carry a weapon suitable to protect themselves
attributes.additional_details: We should be allowed a daily carry suitable to defend against an attacker, and if nessasary go through tests and a screening to decide who is fit to carry and what they are allowed to carry. As the first on any terror/crime scene is always an innocent member of the public not an armed gaurd/police officer! Arm more of our police in these terrible times and give us all the means to protect ourselves!
attributes.background: Due to the uprise in terror threats/acts and the fact France has 278,000 armed police  and was able to do nothing until many lifes were  taken, compared to britan only having 6000, which makes us sitting ducks along with the unarmed police who will make it to the scene LONG befor armed police will..
